messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: At the sceene, Officer Gillian discovered a par of gloves near the vicinty. Despite the darkness, teh Detectve found the gloves which were subsequintly bagged by Crime Lab Techician, Harold Mendez. In an unrelated case, Sergeant O'Conner and Officer Daniels were dispatched to a disturbance at 123 Berkley Street. The Sergeant took the lead in questioning the individuals involved. Meanwhile, Captain Ruiz reviewed the incident report from the previous night's burglary and noted several discrepancies. He called in Detective Marnie Rigsby to re-evaluate the evidence. Lieutenant Baker was on patrol when he was notified of a possible DUI; he conducted a traffic stop and administered a sobriety test, which the driver failed. Coroner Dr. Emily Watson was summoned to the scene of an accidental death at the industrial park; her preliminary findings suggested accidental electrocution. Technician Alexei Volkov analyzed the fingerprints found at the robbery scene, confirming they matched the suspect's known prints. Lastly, Patrol Officer Vega reported to the scene of a minor traffic collision to facilitate the exchange of insurance information between the parties.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer GillianOfficer Context: Discovered a pair of gloves near the vicinity of a crime scene.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Harold MendezOfficer Context: Bagged the gloves found by Officer Gillian.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant O'ConnerOfficer Context: Was dispatched to and took the lead in questioning at a disturbance.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Officer DanielsOfficer Context: Accompanied Sergeant O'Conner to a disturbance and was presumably involved in the situation.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Captain RuizOfficer Context: Reviewed the incident report from the previous night's burglary and noted discrepancies.Officer Role: CaptainOfficer Name: Detective Marnie RigsbyOfficer Context: Called in by Captain Ruiz to re-evaluate the evidence from a burglary incident report.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Lieutenant BakerOfficer Context: Conducted a traffic stop and administered a sobriety test.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Dr. Emily WatsonOfficer Context: Summoned to the scene of an accidental death and suggested accidental electrocution as the preliminary cause.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Technician Alexei VolkovOfficer Context: Analyzed fingerprints from a robbery scene, matching them to the suspect's known prints.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Patrol Officer VegaOfficer Context: Reported to the scene of a minor traffic collision to facilitate the exchange of insurance information.Officer Role: Patrol Officer
